verbs.description: " Our great First Lady [V: is] doing really well . Will be leaving hospital in 2 or 3 days . Thank you for so much love and support ! " President Donald Trump tweeted .
" [ARG0: Our great First Lady] is [V: doing] [ARGM-MNR: really well] . Will be leaving hospital in 2 or 3 days . Thank you for so much love and support ! " President Donald Trump tweeted .
